title: How do I create contacts and use photos as callee IDs?
answer:
**Create contacts:**


On a home screen, touch **People** > **Create contact** > **Phone/SIM**. On the **Phone contact** screen, enter contact information and touch **CANCEL**/**DONE**. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45281)Â 


**Using Photos as Callee IDs** 

Note: Photos cannot be used as callee IDs of UIM contacts. 

Touch **People** and choose a contact. On the **Details** screen, touch the contact image and choose **Take photo**/**Choose photo from Gallery**. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45282)
